title: Diazo Print, "Design for Printed Textile-"Eden," Series #1780", 1966
medium: Blueprint, brush and gouache on off white wove paper
signed: Annotated in print upper right below printed inscription: designed by alexander girard 1/6/66
inscribed: Annotated in print upper right: herman miller fabric pattern / "eden" series no. 1780
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Blueprint of the original drawing, a pattern of fruits, flowers, birds and snakes, with the upper left section of the blueprint colored in yellow, gray, brown and beige gouache.

tombstone.epitaph: Diazo Print, "Design for Printed Textile-"Eden," Series #1780", 1966.Blueprint, brush and gouache on off white wove paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-412.
